Taunton.H. P. Thomas House:
The H. P. Thomas House is an historic house located at 322 Somerset Avenue in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The 2-1/2 story, wood-framed house was built in about 1887, and is a fine local example of Queen Anne styling. The house has asymmetrical massing, with large gable-roof sections projecting from an otherwise hipped roof.
